meanings.definition: A small insect that feeds on plant sap and can be a pest in gardens and farms.
meanings.sent1: The aphid was munching on the leaves of the rose bush.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use ladybugs to control aphid populations in their fields.
meanings.sent3: The aphid thought it was a tiny superhero, saving the plants by drinking their sap.
meanings.sent4: The aphid infestation spread through the garden like a silent invasion.
meanings.sent5: The aphid, with its needle-like mouth, drained the life out of the delicate flowers.
